Interface IChartScaleJustificationsProvider

Namespace
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Script.Chart
Assembly
FinSysPlatform.Domain.Script.dll

An extension for any chart object, which determines the rules of its scaling

public interface IChartScaleJustificationsProvider

Properties

DecimalPlaces

Determines the digits after decimal point to show on the chart null value (by default) means "not specified". For null value, a chart will choose the precision automatically
